title: FAHIZO Men's Dress Shirt Regular Fit Soild Business Formal Long Sleeve Button Up Stretch Shirts
description: 【Flex Fabric】We use High-quality materials which is breathable, durable and has less wrinkles. It also can wick moisture away from the body to help you feel cool and dry. NON-IRON fabric keep you looking crisp all day. Easy care, easy ironing and providing all-day comfort.

【Size and Design】Our men’s dress shirts are US regular fit tailoring style, a variety of sizes and colors for you to choose. Classic design provide long lasting comfort and elegant looking. The classic spread collar easily matches with a tie or bow tie. Please kindly take a note of our size chart below for the best fitting.

【Wide Capability】 This shirt is suitable for various occasions like business meetings, a regular work day, daily casual, office, vacation, dating, party, wedding, stage, etc. It is also a perfect gift for families, friends, colleagues, and boyfriend.
【Easy to Care】 It is easy to clean and can be hand wash or machine washable in cold water. The fabric is well built that can hold up well after washing. Can be use a warm iron if needed.
【Customer Service】We promise that if you aren't satisfied or if there are any other concerns, please reach us and we will resolve them to give you a perfect experience.
